channel.title: Moparisthebest.com Site Header
channel.description:
Well, the image: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/mopar.gif[/img] Isn't getting any better each time i see it, so i was wondering if i could try to convince Moparisthebest to allow us to make a new one.
[speaking directly to moparisthebest] If you would like another contest go ahead and ignore this thread :o [/direction]
EDIT: Not my best but an idea 0.o [img]http://img183.imageshack.us/img183/8981/mopar4pb5.jpg[/img]
EDIT: I did sound a litte stuck up, sorry about that i have re-worded the post.

item.title: Moparisthebest.com Site Header
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:41, topic:192820”]No good fucking goody two shoes people (No offense…) If Mopar decides to have ‘MOAR CONTEST’ Then Let it roll.[/quote]Wtf? goody two shoes people? Are you retarded…?

Read full topic

item.title: Moparisthebest.com Site Header
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

kloplop321:

lol, I actually talked to him about it, but he said he wouldn’t use a flash replica that I made(a WHOLE lot smaller, and a WHOLE lot smoother)

That’s because mitb is boycotting flash until they release a plugin with the support of x64 bit browsers. (unless they already did so?)

item.title: Moparisthebest.com Site Header
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

Wow ``jason, that’s such a huge improvement upon the original. At least the original had animation, and a decent history behind it. Yours is fugly, and just a little brushing with a transparent logo, a color overlay, a grad, and some bad text. Generally to be a good artist, you have to know what art is.

Apology not accepted.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok

item.title: Moparisthebest.com Site Header
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

There was no limit of banners. So, if you think about it, if there are 70 crappy banners, then no one will vote for them. The 10 decent ones will be the ones voted for.

item.title: Moparisthebest.com Site Header
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:33, topic:192820”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=256647.msg2136533#msg2136533 date=1206523537]
It was voted best out of about 80 other banners at one point. Should we have another contest?
[/quote]

Ya, but last time it was full of shitty banners, generated banners, and on top of that the contest was disorderly.

If we do it again we should have a preliminaries to remove all the shit banners :[/quote]

EXACTLY.

Read full topic
